scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Dan
scrape.text: I really enjoyed this story about two couples, the males brothers, who are eating at a fancy restaurant discussing the terrible news this evening, involving each of the two couple's sons.Thought-provoking, and riveting, this story took me to a place dark and mysterious, wondering what is going to happen next.The book is endorsed by a famous author, Gillian Flynn, who wrote "Gone Girl". She said of "The Dinner": "Chilling, nasty, smart, shocking, and unputdownable."I couldn't have said it better myself. 4 stars
